resources.string: use it to find ideal weight , your mass index, and help you to make your life better
first you must fill all requirments as age and height also weight
our application will calculate it depend on international equation
be sure this just An estimated value
use it to find numbers calorie you can burn every day by using Mifflin St Jeor equation
Mifflin St Jeor equation more accurate than others equations
you must fill all your data to calculate your calorie
be sure this just An estimated value
" use it to find numbers calorie you need to do some activity by using Harris Benedict Equation
Harris Benedict Equation is good for calculate calorie do when want do something
you must fill all your data to calculate your calorie
be sure this just An estimated value
you can use our step counter to calculate your calorie burned and number of steps
dont forget select your goal till get alarm when finish your goal
you dont need do any thing to turn on step counter just small shake
